name: The Night Porter
description:
This game was created for the #lostcartridgejam, due to  not having as much time as I had hoped it is currently just 1 level and no sounds or music, but more will be added shortly.

You take the role of Nigel the night porter who has to tidy up the hotel after the guests have gone to bed for the night. Navigate the level collecting the guests rubbish and then exit through the door.

Controls

p - right

o - left

z - jump
